channel.title: I want more opinions on this
channel.description:
if i can join my server on no-ip and my local at same time dose that mean my servers running?
i wanna get more opinions on this before i get my hopes up

item.title: I want more opinions on this
item.dc:creator: @Daem Daem
item.description:
@Daem wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:6, topic:337811”]Are you portfowarded?
If you are and have your no-ip ip setup then yes you are ready to host.[/quote]

my friend says it says error connecting?

Read full topic

item.title: I want more opinions on this
item.dc:creator: @Daem Daem
item.description:
@Daem wrote:

[quote=“abcpker711, post:2, topic:337811”]You shouldn’t ask those types of questions in this section, it’d be better to check if your server is running by clicking the link that I will paste below. Once you get to the website on the link, type in your servers IP-Address, and the port options, 43594 and 5555 will be optional below also.

Link: http://www.google.com/?action=statuscheck

Your welcome for the assistance, if you have anymore questions, you can either post them here, or PM me. Have a nice day![/quote]

pm’d

Read full topic
item.source: I want more opinions on this

item.title: I want more opinions on this
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

You shouldn’t ask those types of questions in this section, it’d be better to check if your server is running by clicking the link that I will paste below. Once you get to the website on the link, type in your servers IP-Address, and the port options, 43594 and 5555 will be optional below also.

Link: http://www.runelocus.com/?action=statuscheck

Your welcome for the assistance, if you have anymore questions, you can either post them here, or PM me. Have a nice day!

Read full topic
